body.name: Old Arcade Retro Classic Handheld Game Console 5 Inch Led Screen Double TF Card 8 GB Internal 64 GB External Over 10000 Preloaded Games (Red and Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 1 min
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 16 mins
features: This handheld game console boasts a 5 inch display, an ergonomic design for optimal grip, and a heightened gaming experience.
This product comes pre-loaded with over 10,000 games and provides access to an internal drive with your all time favorites , as well as a 32 GB SD card with games sorted by type and alphabetically.
Game format: support 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit and 64-bit 128-bit for MAME / CPS1 / NES / GBA / GBC / BIN / GB / SFC / SMD / PS1
Some of the more popular games are sorted for quick access in the internal memory section.
True color screen: 5.1-inch 16 million color 16:9 high-definition screen, resolution 800 X 480
Crystal buttons have a nice feel and light up in dark conditions allowing you to play anywhere.
body.description: Retro Revival: Your Pocket Powerhouse for Entertainment & Nostalgia Rewind to the good old days with the all-new Retro Revival handheld game console! This sleek and stylish device packs a punch, letting you relive the classics and discover new favorites, all at your fingertips. Immerse yourself in vibrant visuals: 5.1-inch color screen: Enjoy crisp and clear visuals on a generous 5.1-inch display with an 800 x 480 resolution. TV output: Take the fun to the big screen! Connect the Retro Revival to your TV via HDMI and share the gaming experience with friends and family. A treasure trove of entertainment: Pre-loaded games: Dive into a nostalgic world with thousands of pre-loaded retro games from iconic consoles like PS1, CPS, MAME, NES, GB, GBC, GBA, SEGA, and SNES. Multi-format playback: Watch movies and TV shows with support for a wide range of video formats like RM/RM/VB/AV/I/FL/V. No conversion needed! Music for every mood: Groove to your favorite tunes with MP3, WMA, OGG, AAC, WA, V formats, and even enjoy high-fidelity audio with APE and FLAC support. Unleash your inner artist and bookworm: Image browsing: Browse and admire your photos in popular formats like JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIF, and PNG. E-reader: Curl up with a good book thanks to the built-in e-reader support for TXT files. The unique bookmark function lets you pick up where you left off anytime. Power meets convenience: Memory options: Choose between 8GB or 128GB of built-in storage to hold your game library and multimedia content. Digital recording: Capture high-quality audio with the built-in microphone, perfect for recording lectures, meetings, or even your own music creations. Retro Revival is the ultimate companion for gamers, music lovers, and anyone who appreciates a touch of nostalgia. Order yours today and rediscover the joys of retro entertainment! Additional features: Built-in rechargeable battery Compact and portable design Available in vibrant Blue & Red colors Or Classic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and product
reviews.reviewText: Liked the product and the fast shipping before Christmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not all bad
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cool console, with a lot of games inside.However, it is very hard to browse the games and navigate through the folders inside.After two weeks of using, I still need to order all games to my taste, so keep in mind you need to invest some time to check all the games inside.If you have children who don't know how to deal with an SD card, it might be a pain.Battery seems ok, you can play a few hours before you need to recharge.Also, it seems that GB and GBA don't work, but the rest are work fine without crahses or lag.It has a lot of classics, so I'm happy to have them.Most of the games are in English, but it also has quite a few in Japanese.You can save the progess anytime, up to six slots for each game.And it comes with a 64GB SD card, so no promblem with memory savings.You can't also add games by your own, if you think any game is missing.Overall, I'd say it is not the best console out there, but a good console that worths the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No me gustó el producto. Juegos viejos y a los chicos no me atrajo. Difícil encontrar todos los juegos que dice tener
